name: BLOCKOUT (itch)
description:
How To Play Blockout:

The 'Green' Blocks can only be moved vertically....use W and S or Up and Down arrow keys to move them(W moves them down, S moves them up...)

The 'Pink' blocks can only be moved horizontally...use A and D or Left arrow and Right arrow to move them(A moves them left, D moves them right..)

The block with the blue ribbon should be moved out to touch the button to go to the next level...

Have Fun Playing :)...

P.S: Press a random key on your keyboard for the last level...
